---1816629470-568174803-1327683818=:91197
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi,

I am doing local crawling using H3 with some test seeds and trying to =
control heritrix through API. last night when i started two crawls one usin=
g 434 seeds and another using 4801 seeds. Once i start the crawl i monitor =
it using the "progress-statistics" log file in the logs folder in the job i=
nstance. I have attached the two log files to this message...

The problem =
is that when i am monitoring the "progress-statistics" log i came to know t=
hat the queue is not clearing up and its staying the same number for some t=
ime. I left the crawl like that and went home, when i opened these files in=
 the morning i saw that it took 7-8 hours for those jobs to be finished bec=
ause the queue is not clearing up=A0

This is very time consuming for me wh=
en i am trying to run a lot of different crawls at the same time and i need=
 some help from the group about how i can skip those URI's if its a problem=
 with the URI and reduce the waiting time for the queue to clear up.


Many=
 Thanks ! I appreciate how your group is helping to clear out the problems =
using Heritrix

Regards
Kiran
